reviews.customers_say: Customers love the sweater's amazing texture and luxurious feel, describing it as heavy and expensive-looking, with one noting it feels like a designer cardigan.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don't be swayed by these bad reviews. It looks just like photo
items.body: LOVE. Looks just like photo. Well I got the San same color so that helps. Heavier and thicker than expected but so soft and comfy. Not an ounce of itchiness. Definitely has an oversized fit. Great quality. Feels like a designer cardigan Read more
items.author: Kirby

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and pretty
items.body: Just beautiful, so many compliments on it. SOFT and non itchy. A bit big, order a size down for a regular fit, or your regular size for a slouchy look Read more
items.author: Donna v.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Best for Tall Plus Sized Women - Runs Many Sizes Larger Than Anticipated
items.body: This is a beautiful, soft, snuggly cardigan that looks so elegant and plush. Sadly I had to return it. I ordered in both a size Small and Extra Small after consulting the size chart. They were too big overall, and even too long in the length of the arms. I did not feel they created an "elegant drape" but rather looked frumpy. I am 5'7, 140 lbs, 34F bust, 30" waist, 40" hip. I normally wear a ladies dress size 10. These did not look good on me and the fit didn't feel right at all either. If you are looking for something that is incredibly oversized, I could recommend you size down in this and you will be happy. I cannot speak to how these would wash, as I returned them, nor to how they would how up over time. I can say that they did appear to be of great quality. The material felt very wonderful in every possible way. It was also thick enough to make me think it would hold up well over time. There were no loose threads, uneven seams, or any other quality that diminished the overall effect. This is a beautiful garment, but I would say it is best for women who are very tall or plus sized. Read more
items.author: J. D. Robinson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite Fall 2025 sweather - it's EVERYTHING
items.body: I am absolutely in love with this sweater.It is soft and fuzzy.And so warm is the perfect sweater. I've placed an order in three different colors. I ordered a size small, I'm 5'1, 126lbs. Is the perfect slightly oversized fit sweater. If you do, want the drop off the shoulder look, you might want to go a little size bigger than what you actually need. I ordered the winery, hoping it would be more burgundy, but it really is a true winery color not a deep burgundy.I have also ordered in chocolate and i've ordered in khaki and also the dark gray. An excellent value for the money. It's my new fave thing for fall. Read more
items.author: WillaRenea

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars RIP Elmo
items.body: LOL. I ordered this sweater in red thinking it would be fun for the holidays; however, when I opened the package, all I could think of and see was ELMO. Like the sweater is literally made out of a muppet—that is the color and texture. RIP Elmo. This sweater will have to be returned unless I get a casting call from Sesame Street before I make it to UPS. The sweater is pretty heavy, which may be nice if you live where it’s cold and just want to take a warm nap and dream of cuddling Elmo. The aesthetic is muppet frumpy. Obviously the sweater didn’t work for me, but it might fit your fancy. I’d go for green if you’re more of a Kermit girl. Read more
items.author: AB

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm and pretty
items.body: Great quality, thick and warm. The material is so soft as well. Read more
items.author: Angie

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Missed the mark and too much static cling
items.body: ★★★☆☆ Not the Luxe Sweater I Hoped For I really wanted to love the Yimoon Women’s Fuzzy Cardigan Sweater, but it missed the mark for me. It’s definitely not the luxe, soft, cozy sweater the photos make it look like. The fabric has a lot of static cling and feels more stiff and scratchy than fuzzy or sexy. For a quick, thrown-together cozy look, it might work, but don’t expect high-end quality. For reference, I’m 5'5" and 130 lbs, and I ordered a size medium, it’s actually pretty fitted on me. If you want the slouchy, relaxed look shown in the pictures, you’d need to size up at least two sizes. Overall, it’s okay, but not the elevated, soft cardigan I expected. Read more
items.author: Elizabeth Challoner

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit as expected, very well made, not cheap looking.
items.body: Fit as expected! If u want it loose like the pic, size up. Next one will be a Sz larger to give it the oversized look. Fabric is sooo fluffy and high quality, very thick! Read more
items.author: Tina L Williams

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Winered, Brown, Apricot, Black, Lightgrey, Armygreen, Red, Khaki, Pink, White, Beige, Yellow, Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs.
